summary: Status agent analysis comparing live container/service states against docs/INFRASTRUCTURE_MAP.md. Identified 6 mismatches requiring map updates.
architecture: Multi-node infrastructure with vps.host (freqkflag.co/SPINE), home.macmini (twist3dkink.online), and home.linux (cult-of-joey.com). Services run via Docker Compose with shared 'edge' network and Infisical-managed secrets.
current_phase: Operational - Services running but documentation requires updates to reflect actual state
overall_health: Degraded - Multiple services have health issues (Supabase components unhealthy/restarting, GitLab starting, one postgres container exited)
key_findings: GitLab is starting (health: starting) but map shows as 'Configured but not running'
Supabase is running with unhealthy components (studio, meta unhealthy; kong restarting) but map shows as 'Configured but not running'
ops-control-plane service is running healthy but not listed in infrastructure tree
infra-postgres-1 container is stopped (Exited 3 hours ago) but not documented in map
WordPress domain mapping mismatch: map shows 'wp.freqkflag.co' but should be 'cultofjoey.com' per AGENTS.md
LinkStack domain mapping: map shows both 'link.freqkflag.co' and 'link.cultofjoey.com' - need to clarify which service uses which domain

mismatches.recommendation: Update map to ⚠️ Running but starting, or wait for health check to complete then update to ✅

mismatches.actual_status: Running with issues (supabase-db healthy, supabase-studio unhealthy, supabase-meta unhealthy, supabase-kong restarting)

mismatches.actual_status: Need clarification - is LinkStack running on both nodes?
mismatches.recommendation: Verify which LinkStack instance uses which domain and update map accordingly
mismatches.location: vps.host tree line 23, home.linux tree line 39

blockers: Supabase health issues (kong restarting, studio/meta unhealthy) need investigation
